text: Love For All, Hatred For None.
author: Khalifatul Masih III

text: "Never regret anything that made you smile."
author: Mark Twain

text: "One day the people that don’t even believe in you will tell everyone how they met you."
author: Johnny Depp

text: "If I’m gonna tell a real story, I’m gonna start with my name."
author: Kendrick Lamar

text: "Hate comes from intimidation, love comes from appreciation."
author: Tyga

text: "Yesterday you said tomorrow. Just do it."
author: Nike

text: "Reality is wrong, dreams are for real."
author: Tupac

text: "To live will be an awfully big adventure."
author: Peter Pan

text: "The time is always right to do what is right."
author: Martin Luther King Jr.
